question: Which Bollywood personality has been honoured by European Union for strengthening Europe-India cultural ties?
explanation: Megastar Amitabh Bachchan has been honoured by European Union for strengthening Europe-India cultural ties. Bachchan, whose last release \"102 Not Out\", co-starring Rishi Kapoor, was well-received by critics as well as audiences, will next be seen in \"Thugs of Hindostan\".
